About Work academia Blog
About Work academia Blog
Hi there, I'm Raj!

I'm a fastidious coffee enthusiast on the art of making coffee, a learning-to-be minimalist but definitely not utilitarian, and a solo backpacking travel enthusiast!

On a professional note, I'm a Computer Engineer with professional experience in Cloud computing, Software-Defined Networking, Full-Stack development and a little bit of Cybersecurity. I like to learn how technologies work; from web applications to systems software used in robotics. I like to break things to prank folks (like using Chromecast and WiFi jammers). I'm not a huge fan on looking at lower-level languages like Assembly code, but I do like to dig into details of how applications work (how the software utilize resources, networking stack, security, etc.).
